snippet.title: Boston Marathon 2014: Route Info, Weather Forecast and Top Contenders
snippet.description: As it continues to heal from the tragic events of last year, the city of Boston should have ideal weather and a stacked field for the 118th Boston Marathon. No matter what, the event certainly won't hurt for lack of participation...
